oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Friends of Highlander Statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Highlander defending the school from charges brought upon it by the state and Grundy County. The statement alleged that the state was only had it out for Highlander because it was an integrated institution and their charges were false. The letter makes a call to action to attend a September 14 meeting at Altamont and closes with an advocation of Highlander's work specifically its citizenship schools.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Communism; Civil rights; Race relations; Governmental investigations; School integration; Pre-trial procedure; Witnesses; Race relations; Segregation; Adult education; Citizenship--Study and teaching
